newsitem.title: FINLAND: UNIBANK SEES FINLAND BANK DAMPENING MARKKA RISE.
newsitem.headline: UNIBANK SEES FINLAND BANK DAMPENING MARKKA RISE.

text.p: Danish Unibank said in a report received on Monday it expected the Bank of Finland to dampen the markka's appreciation, and saw DEM/FIM support at 2.98.
"Wee look for the central bank to put a damper on markka appreciation in the time ahead and see a temporary bottom on the low side of 2.9800," Unibank said.
Further ahead, market players would focus on ERM central parity rates as likely couplings to the euro, and a long term strategy would be to sell markka against French francs, it said.
DEM/FIM has been inching lower since May when it stood just above 3.00, and traded at 2.9820 early on Monday.
